Class Simulator

    • Simulator

extends java.lang.Object
    Simulator Class to run simuation. CS2030: Ahmed Bahajjaj

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        public Simulator​(java.util.LinkedList<Customer> q,
                 int s)
        Constructor to create a new simulation.
        Parameters:
        q - LinkedList of customers to be simulated
        s - Number of servers to be simulated

    • Method Detail

      • simulate

        public void simulate()
        Runs the simulation. Simulation is run by first sorting the queue, then polling the queue, then handling the customer polled. Prints out the statistics afterwards.

      • findServer

        public int findServer​(Server[] s)
        Method to find available server. Checks first if any are idle, then if any have available space in their queue if all are busy.
        Parameters:
        s - Array of servers in simulation
        Returns:
        ID of next available server

      • eventArrive

        public void eventArrive​(Customer cust,
                        int i)
        Method to manage arriving customer. Customers arriving are filtered into one of three states depending on server availability at time of Customer arrival.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer to be managed.
        i - ID of available server (if any)

      • eventServe

        public void eventServe​(Customer cust,
                       int a,
                       boolean n)
        Method to serve a Customer. (1) Server's next available time gets updated. (2) Customer's next (a) time reference and (b) event reference gets updated. (3) Statistics updated (4) Server + Customer get updated depending on whether it's a new Customer or one already in the queue. (5) After printing, customer is set to 'Done' and added back into the queue.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer to be served.
        a - Server array index to be referenced (-1 of Server ID).
        n - Whether customer to be served is new (true) or has been waiting in the queue (false).

      • eventWait

        public double eventWait​(Customer cust,
                        int a)
        Method to make a Customer wait. Modifies customer's (1) time reference, (2) server reference, and (3) Event reference. Modifies server's (a) time reference and (b) available space. Customer is then added back into the 'queue'.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer to make wait
        a - Server array index to be referenced (-1 of Server ID).
        Returns:
        Waiting time.

      • eventLeave

        public void eventLeave​(Customer cust)
        Method for a Customer to leave.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer leaving.

      • eventDone

        public void eventDone​(Customer cust)
        Method for a Customer to be 'done'.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer done.

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent​(Customer cust)
        Method to handle a Customer from one of three states. Customer is either new, has been waiting, or is done.
        Parameters:
        cust - Customer to be handled.
